    Photo credit: Pinterest

    Hello there! I am pursuing MS by Research at International Institute of Information Techology, Hyderabad. My present work is in the field of understanding video representations and action recognition in videos. I have worked on string sorting algorithms using heterogeneous multicore architectures in the past.

    In my leisure time, I like to explore new ideas and write about them. I’m a spiritual, straightforward and a happy-go-crazy guy. I love coding, machine learning and all things soccer.

    Aside: I love watching Naruto and this is my favorite Official Soundtrack.
